title: A voucher for a free cupcake!
description: Exchange 4500 points for a voucher that can later be redeemed for a free cupcake.

attributes.value: No further action required. Points have been received and voucher sent.
Your free cupcake voucher has been send. You can use as a voucher to get a cupcake at a later date.
Valid voucher. Give cupcake to customer.
